intro.caption: BIENVENUE DANS LE METAVERSE STORE DE DEMAIN BEAUTY
intro.tutorial_step_1: Hello, I'm Sandra Gasmi, the founder of Demain Beauty, a skincare and food supplement brand. I am delighted to welcome you today to introduce our products and commitments to you.
intro.tutorial_step_2: Demain® is a holistic skincare brand whose mission is to take care of your skin, your health, and our planet.
intro.tutorial_step_3: Our products are clean, organic, and healthy. This means they are 100% safe, 100% naturally sourced, and certified organic. Our products are also respectful of the microbiome and the planet.

otherInfo: This post-biotic with a pre-biotic effect and a unique lipidic composition acts on the skin's ecosystem to maintain its barrier function, preserve the diversity of the microbiota and rebalance it. go_for_protection_skincare.name: GO FOR PROTECTION
go_for_protection_skincare.productFeature: Hydrates and protects the skin from external aggressions (pollution, blue light, infrared, UVA) that accelerate skin ageing. Radiance is preserved and the signs of ageing linked to oxidative stress are pushed back

time_to_detox.name: TIME TO DETOX
time_to_detox.productFeature: Removes pollution, dust, make-up and all accumulated impurities while nourishing and protecting the skin microbiota

go_for_glow.name: GO FOR GLOW
go_for_glow.productFeature: Eliminates impurities and dead skin. Strengthens the skin's balance while respecting the microbiome

time_to_repair.name: TIME TO REPAIR
time_to_repair.productFeature: Detoxifies, nourishes and repairs the skin

happy_age.name: HAPPY AGE
happy_age.productFeature: Global anti-ageing serum acts in a targeted way on all signs of ageing

sculpt_glow.name: SCLUPT&GLOW
sculpt_glow.productFeature: Redensifies, smoothes, nourishes, soothes and protects for a firmer and more luminous skin

go_for_detox.name: GO FOR DETOX
go_for_detox.productFeature: Helps eliminate toxins, better drain and purify the body. Cleaned of its waste, the body regains all its functionality. Its energy is better distributed and the skin is more beautiful

go_for_protection_dietary.name: GO FOR PROTECTION Dietary
go_for_protection_dietary.productFeature: Acts from within to strengthen the immune system and help the body to better protect itself from external aggressions that accelerate skin ageing
